verses.verse: Then the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>what<s%> was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And the <S%H3027>power<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> <S%H5810>prevailed<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> <S%H4480>Because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> for themselves the <S%H4492>dens<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were in the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and the <S%H4631>caves<s%> and the <S%H4679>strongholds.<s%>

For it was <S%H518>when<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H2232>sown,<s%> that the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> would <S%H5927>come<s%> up with the <S%H6002>Amalekites<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%> and <S%H5927>go<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them.

So they would <S%H2583>camp<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them and <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H2981>produce<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> <S%H935><s%> as <S%H5804>Gaza,<s%> and <S%H7604>leave<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4241>sustenance<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> as well as no <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> <S%H7794>ox,<s%> or <S%H2543>donkey.<s%>

For they would <S%H5927>come<s%> up with their <S%H4735>livestock<s%> and their <S%H168>tents,<s%> they would <S%H935>come<s%> in like <S%H697>locusts<s%> for <S%H7230>number,<s%> both they and their <S%H1581>camels<s%> were <S%H369>innumerable<s%><S%H4557>;<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H7843>devastate<s%> it.

So <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H1809>brought<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1809>low<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> on <S%H182>account<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%>

that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> 'It was I who <S%H5927>brought<s%> you up from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>slavery.<s%>

'And I <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you from the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> and from the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3905>oppressors,<s%> and <S%H1644>dispossessed<s%> them <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you and <S%H5414>gave<s%> you their <S%H776>land,<s%>

and I <S%H559>said<s%> to you, "I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> you shall not <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> in <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> you <S%H3427>live.<s%> But you have not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> <S%H6963><s%> Me."' "

Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H424>oak<s%> that was in <S%H6084>Ophrah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> belonged to <S%H3060>Joash<s%> the <S%H33>Abiezrite<s%> as his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> was <S%H2251>beating<s%> out <S%H2406>wheat<s%> in the <S%H1660>wine<s%> <S%H1660>press<s%> in order to <S%H5127>save<s%> [it] from the <S%H4080>Midianites.<s%>
And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to him and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is with you, O <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H1368>warrior.<s%>"

Then <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H994>"O<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> if the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is with us, <S%H4100>why<s%> then has <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4672>happened<s%> to us? And <S%H346>where<s%> are <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H6381>miracles<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> our fathers <S%H1>told<s%> us about, <S%H5608>saying,<s%> 'Did not the <S%H559>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>bring<s%> us up from <S%H5927>Egypt<s%>?' But <S%H4714>now<s%> the <S%H6258>Lord<s%> has <S%H3068>abandoned<s%> us and <S%H5203>given<s%> us into the <S%H5414>hand<s%> of <S%H3709>Midian.<s%>"

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6437>looked<s%> at him and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> your <S%H3581>strength<s%> and <S%H3467>deliver<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian.<s%> Have I not <S%H7971>sent<s%> you?"

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to Him, <S%H994>"O<s%> <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> shall I <S%H3467>deliver<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> my <S%H505>family<s%> is the <S%H1800>least<s%> in <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> and I am the <S%H6810>youngest<s%> in my father's <S%H1004>house.<s%>"
But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3588>"Surely<s%> I will be with you, and you shall <S%H5221>defeat<s%> <S%H4080>Midian<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>"

So Gideon <S%H559>said<s%> to Him, <S%H518>"If<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in Thy <S%H5869>sight,<s%> then <S%H6213>show<s%> me a <S%H226>sign<s%> that it is Thou who <S%H1696>speakest<s%> with me.

<S%H4994>"Please<s%> do not <S%H4185>depart<s%> from <S%H2088>here,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> I <S%H935>come<s%> [back] to Thee, and <S%H3318>bring<s%> out my <S%H4503>offering<s%> and <S%H5117>lay<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> Thee." And He <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H3427>remain<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> you <S%H7725>return.<s%>"

Then <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> in and <S%H6213>prepared<s%> a <S%H1423>kid<s%> <S%H5795><s%> and <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>bread<s%> from an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of <S%H7058>flour;<s%> he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H1320>meat<s%> in a <S%H5536>basket<s%> and the <S%H4839>broth<s%> in a <S%H6517>pot,<s%> and <S%H3318>brought<s%> [them] out to him <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H424>oak,<s%> and <S%H5066>presented<s%> [them.]

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3947>"Take<s%> the <S%H1320>meat<s%> and the <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>bread<s%> and <S%H5117>lay<s%> them on <S%H1975>this<s%> <S%H5553>rock,<s%> and <S%H8210>pour<s%> out the <S%H4839>broth.<s%>" And he <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so.<s%>

Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7971>put<s%> out the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H4938>staff<s%> that was in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> and <S%H5060>touched<s%> the <S%H1320>meat<s%> and the <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>bread;<s%> and <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H5927>sprang<s%> up from the <S%H6697>rock<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> the <S%H1320>meat<s%> and the <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>bread.<s%> Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1980>vanished<s%> from his <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

When <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that he was the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H162>"Alas,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God!<s%> For <S%H5921>now<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6440>face.<s%>"
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H7965>"Peace<s%> to you, do not <S%H3372>fear;<s%> you shall not <S%H4191>die.<s%>"

Then <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H7121>named<s%> it The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H7965>Peace.<s%> To <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> it is <S%H5750>still<s%> in <S%H6084>Ophrah<s%> of the <S%H33>Abiezrites.<s%>

Now the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> it <S%H1961>came<s%> about that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3947>"Take<s%> your father's <S%H1>bull<s%> and a <S%H6499>second<s%> <S%H8145>bull<s%> <S%H6499>seven<s%> <S%H7651>years<s%> old, and <S%H8141>pull<s%> <S%H2040>down<s%> the <S%H2040>altar<s%> of <S%H4196>Baal<s%> <S%H1168>which<s%> belongs to your father, and <S%H834>cut<s%> <S%H3772>down<s%> the <S%H3772>Asherah<s%> that is <S%H842>beside<s%> it;

and <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> in an <S%H4634>orderly<s%> <S%H4634>manner,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6499>bull<s%> and <S%H5927>offer<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> with the <S%H6086>wood<s%> of the <S%H842>Asherah<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>down.<s%> "

Then <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to him; and it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, <S%H834>because<s%> he was too <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of his father's <S%H1004>household<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> it by <S%H3119>day,<s%> that he <S%H6213>did<s%> it by <S%H3915>night.<s%>

When the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H7925>arose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%> was <S%H5422>torn<s%> <S%H5422>down,<s%> and the <S%H842>Asherah<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H5921>beside<s%> it was <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>down,<s%> and the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6499>bull<s%> was <S%H5927>offered<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> which had been <S%H1129>built.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H7453>another,<s%> <S%H4310>"Who<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%>?" And when they <S%H1875>searched<s%> about and <S%H1245>inquired,<s%> they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1439>"Gideon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3060>Joash<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing.<s%>"

Then the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3060>Joash,<s%> <S%H3318>"Bring<s%> out your <S%H1121>son,<s%> that he may <S%H4191>die,<s%> for he has <S%H5422>torn<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> and <S%H3588>indeed,<s%> he has <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>down<s%> the <S%H842>Asherah<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H5921>beside<s%> it."

But <S%H3060>Joash<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him, "Will you <S%H7378>contend<s%> for <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> will you <S%H3467>deliver<s%> him? <S%H834>Whoever<s%> will <S%H7378>plead<s%> for him shall be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death<s%> by <S%H1242>morning.<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> he is a <S%H430>god,<s%> let him <S%H7378>contend<s%> for himself, <S%H3588>because<s%> someone has <S%H5422>torn<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> his <S%H4196>altar.<s%>"

Therefore on that <S%H3117>day<s%> he <S%H7121>named<s%> him <S%H3378>Jerubbaal,<s%> that is to <S%H559>say,<s%> "Let <S%H1168>Baal<s%> <S%H7378>contend<s%> against him," <S%H3588>because<s%> he had <S%H5422>torn<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> his <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> and the <S%H6002>Amalekites<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H622>assembled<s%> themselves; and they <S%H5674>crossed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>

So the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3847>came<s%> upon <S%H1439>Gideon;<s%> and he <S%H8628>blew<s%> a <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> and the <S%H44>Abiezrites<s%> were <S%H2199>called<s%> <S%H2199>together<s%> to <S%H310>follow<s%> him.

And he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H3605>throughout<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> and they <S%H1571>also<s%> were <S%H2199>called<s%> <S%H2199>together<s%> to <S%H310>follow<s%> him; and he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H836>Asher,<s%> <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> and <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> and they <S%H5927>came<s%> up to <S%H7122>meet<s%> them.

Then <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> Thou <S%H3426>wilt<s%> <S%H3467>deliver<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> me, as Thou hast <S%H1696>spoken,<s%>

<S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H3322>put<s%> a <S%H1492>fleece<s%> of <S%H6785>wool<s%> on the <S%H1637>threshing<s%> <S%H1637>floor.<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> there is <S%H2919>dew<s%> on the <S%H1492>fleece<s%> <S%H905>only,<s%> and it is <S%H2721>dry<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>ground,<s%> then I will <S%H3045>know<s%> that Thou wilt <S%H3467>deliver<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> me, as Thou hast <S%H1696>spoken.<s%> "

And it was <S%H3651>so.<s%> When he <S%H7925>arose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> the <S%H4283>next<s%> <S%H4283>morning<s%> and <S%H2115>squeezed<s%> the <S%H1492>fleece,<s%> he <S%H4680>drained<s%> the <S%H2919>dew<s%> from the <S%H1492>fleece,<s%> a <S%H5602>bowl<s%> <S%H4393>full<s%> of <S%H4325>water.<s%>

Then <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> "Do not let Thine <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H2734>burn<s%> against me that I may <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6471>once<s%> <S%H6471>more;<s%> <S%H4994>please<s%> let me <S%H5254>make<s%> a <S%H5254>test<s%> <S%H6471>once<s%> <S%H6471>more<s%> with the <S%H1492>fleece,<s%> let it <S%H4994>now<s%> be <S%H2721>dry<s%> <S%H905>only<s%> on the <S%H1492>fleece,<s%> and let there be <S%H2919>dew<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>ground.<s%>"

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> that <S%H3915>night;<s%> for it was <S%H2721>dry<s%> <S%H905>only<s%> on the <S%H1492>fleece,<s%> and <S%H2919>dew<s%> was on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>ground.<s%>
